byline.contributor: Eli Yokley reported from Tyrone, Mo.; Richard Pérez-Peña from New York; and John Eligon from Kansas City, Mo. Alain Delaqueriere contributed research from New York.
byline.original: By ELI YOKLEY, RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and JOHN ELIGON

abstract: Joseph Jesse Aldridge barges into four different homes in Tyrone, Mo, killing seven people before turning gun on himself; authorities are investigating.
lead_paragraph: The suspect, who was found dead after the shootings, is believed to have killed his victims in four different homes.

headline.main: Tiny Missouri Town Is Reeling After Gunman Kills Seven Neighbors
headline.print_headline: Tiny Missouri Town Is Reeling After Gunman Kills Seven Neighbors

snippet: The suspect, who was found dead after the shootings, is believed to have killed his victims in four different homes.
